/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene winter scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the bare trees that dominate the frame. These trees, devoid of leaves, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun casts its warm glow through the branches, creating a beautiful interplay of light and shadow. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The ground is blanketed in snow, reflecting the sunlight and adding a sparkling quality to the scene.
